hello kozw,
My OS is Windows 7, run on .net 4.5.
ModernWindow set MaxWidth="600"
When I drag the window to the top of my screen, then the window change to Maximized, the bug show: you can see on the window's right side, It has a white space;
I want to know what's going on, think you.

I finally know:
<Setter TargetName="LayoutRoot" Property="Margin" Value="7" />
really interesting!
